<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Grimbal](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2171)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghost" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=217" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=149" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 76</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3)

**Skills**
[Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Site Bound** 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 75
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation)

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
all damage 5 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128), double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**Rejuvenation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Restoring Grimbal's head from area F4 to his remains in this room allows him to move on to the afterlife.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ghostly hand +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 negative plus drain mind

**Drain Mind**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When Grimbal damages a living creature with his ghostly hand Strike, the ghost gains 5 temporary Hit Points, and the creature must succeed at a DC 24 Will save or become [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37). Further damage dealt by the ghost increases this stupefied value by 1 on a failed save to a maximum of stupefied 4. Each time a creature affected by drain mind gets a full night's rest, decrease its stupefied value caused by drain mind by 1.

</column>
